import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; // Import Bootstrap Icons import './verticalmenu.css'; // Adjust the path as necessary import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import backgroundLogo from '../images/Carecloud.png'; import patient from '../images/patient.png'; import Consultation from '../images/Consultation (1).png'; import Laboratory from '../images/Laboratory.png'; import Account from '../images/Account.png'; import Pharmacy from '../images/Pharmacy2.png'; import Report from '../images/Report.png'; import Set_Up from '../images/Set_up.png'; import Plus from '../images/istockphoto-832142860-612x612__1_-removebg-preview.png'; const VerticalMenu = () => { // Step 1: Track the currently open menu, including 'patients', 'consultation', and 'laboratory' const [activeMenu, setActiveMenu] = useState(null); // Step 2: Handle dropdown toggling, ensuring only one is open at a time const toggleDropdown = (menu) => { setActiveMenu((prevMenu) => (prevMenu === menu ? null : menu)); // Close if clicked again, else open }; return (
    {/* Patients Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('patients')}>
    Patients
    {/* Down arrow */}     {/* Dropdown for Add and Find Patient */} {activeMenu === 'patients' && (
    • {/* Use Link to navigate to the Patient Registration route */}
      Add Patient
    • Find Patient
    )}
    • {/* Consultation Menu */}
  • Consultation
    {/* Down arrow */}

  • Laboratory
    {/* Down arrow */}
    • {/* Account Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('Account')}>
    Account
    {/* Down arrow */}     {/* Dropdown for Process Payment*/} {activeMenu === 'Account' && (
    • Process Payment
    )}
    • {/* Pharmacy Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('Pharmacy')}>
    Pharmacy
    {/* Down arrow */}     {/* Dropdown for Give Drugs,Add Drugs and Manage Drugs */} {activeMenu === 'Pharmacy' && (
    • Give Drugs
    • Add Drugs
    • Manage Drugs
    )}
    • {/* Report Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('Report')}>
    Report
    {/* Down arrow */}     {/* Dropdown for Give Drugs,Add Drugs and Manage Drugs */} {activeMenu == 'Report' && (
    • Today Sales Report
    )}
    • {/* SetUp Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('Set up')}>
    Set Up
    {/* Dropdown for Give Drugs,Add Drugs and Manage Drugs */} {activeMenu == 'Set up' && (
    • Add System Users
    • Manage System Users
    • Users Log Activity
    )}
); }; export default VerticalMenu;
